Race.SpecificTitle: City of Abbeville -- 1/2% S&U Tax - CC - Perp.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Abbeville, State of Louisiana (the "City"), under the provisions of the constitution and other statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of 1/2 of one percent (0.5%) (the "Tax") ($1,400,000.00 is expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) in perpetuity, beginning October 1, 2019, upon the sales at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property, and on sales of services in the City, all as defined by law, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to be dedicated as follows: to provide sustainable raises for the City's fulltime employees, as determined by the City, in the manner provided by law?
